metadata.title: CVE-2020-36774 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
plugins/gtk+/glade-gtk-box.c in GNOME Glade before 3.38.1 and 3.39.x before3.40.0 mishandles widget rebuilding for GladeGtkBox, leading to a denial ofservice (application crash).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36774` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-gladeui-2.0 - 3.38.2-7
glade - 3.38.2-7
libgladeui-2-13 - 3.38.2-7
libgladeui-common - 3.38.2-7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glade package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.38.2-7').
